tier_1.notes: Weak tier, uncommon in end-game content

tier_2.notes: Mid tier, common on early-game champions

tier_3.notes: STRONGEST tier, CRITICAL for end-game content (Clan Boss, dungeons). This is the GOLD STANDARD debuff.

effect.description: Reduces target's DEF by X%, increasing ALL damage taken from ALL sources (base skills, Warmaster, Giant Slayer, HP Burn is NOT affected).
effect.landing_process: 2-step: (1) Skill base chance (varies), (2) ACC vs RES check ((ACC - RES + 200) / 400, capped 0-95%)
effect.notes: Decrease DEF is MULTIPLICATIVE damage increase for entire team. 60% DEF reduction = ~1.73× team damage increase (see Damage_Formulas.json for calculation).

damage_calculation.formula: See Damage_Formulas.json for DEF reduction formula. Short version: Target takes more damage when DEF is reduced.

unm_clan_boss_base_def.notes: UNM Clan Boss has 2800 DEF. Without Decrease DEF, champions deal ONLY 30% of base damage (70% damage reduction from high DEF). This is why Decrease DEF is CRITICAL.

decrease_def_15_percent.notes: Decrease DEF 15%: Boss DEF drops to 2380 (2800 × 0.85). Team damage increases 1.15× (+15%). WEAK tier, not recommended for end-game.

decrease_def_30_percent.notes: Decrease DEF 30%: Boss DEF drops to 1960 (2800 × 0.70). Team damage increases 1.33× (+33%). MID tier, acceptable but not optimal.

decrease_def_60_percent.notes: Decrease DEF 60%: Boss DEF drops to 1120 (2800 × 0.40). Team damage increases 1.73× (+73%). CRITICAL debuff for Clan Boss. This is the TARGET tier.

stag_knight.notes: Stag Knight A2 is PREMIUM Decrease DEF 60% skill. Also applies Decrease ATK 50% (dual debuff). 90% base chance × 72.5% ACC/RES (350 ACC vs 300 RES) = 65.25% land rate. 2-turn duration, 4-turn CD = 26.1% uptime. LOW uptime, but MASSIVE impact when active (team damage 1.73×).

rhazin_scarhide.notes: Rhazin A1 is PREMIUM Decrease DEF 60% skill. 100% base chance, 0-turn CD (can apply every turn). Also applies Decrease Turn Meter 30%. With 350 ACC (72.5% land rate), expected uptime is 145% (capped at 100% due to overlapping 2-turn debuffs). Near-perfect uptime.

warmaiden.notes: Warmaiden A3 is FREE Decrease DEF 60% champion (farmable Uncommon). 100% base chance, 2-turn duration, 4-turn CD. With 350 ACC (72.5% land rate), uptime 29%. BUDGET option for early-game. Outclassed by Stag Knight (also applies Decrease ATK 50%) or Rhazin (A1, 100% uptime).

strategy_1_high_acc.acc_impact: 350 ACC vs 300 RES = 72.5% land rate. 390 ACC vs 300 RES = 97.5% land rate (+25% land rate = +25% uptime).
strategy_1_high_acc.notes: ACC is CRITICAL for Decrease DEF uptime. Stag Knight with 390 ACC (vs 350 ACC) increases uptime from 26.1% → 35% (+34% relative increase).

strategy_2_low_cd_skills.notes: Low CD skills are PREMIUM for uptime. Rhazin A1 (0-turn CD) achieves 100% uptime. Stag Knight A2 (4-turn CD) achieves only 26-35% uptime. If possible, use champion with A1 Decrease DEF (Rhazin, Tayrel) for 100% uptime.

strategy_3_master_hexer.effect: 30% chance to extend debuff duration by 1 turn
strategy_3_master_hexer.notes: Master Hexer is HIGH VALUE for Decrease DEF champions with 4-turn CD. Extends 2-turn duration → 3-turn duration (30% of time), increasing uptime by 30%. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Stag Knight, Warmaiden, etc.

strategy_4_multiple_sources.secondary_source: Stag Knight A2 (26-35% uptime, also applies Decrease ATK 50%)
strategy_4_multiple_sources.notes: If Decrease DEF uptime is <100%, consider adding secondary source. Rhazin A1 (100% uptime) + Stag Knight A2 (also Decrease ATK 50%) = 100% Decrease DEF uptime + 26% Decrease ATK uptime (Stag Knight fills ATK reduction gaps).

clan_boss.team_damage_impact: Increase team damage from 44M baseline → 76M with Decrease DEF 60% (assumes 100% uptime)
clan_boss.priority: HIGHEST PRIORITY debuff (even higher than HP Burn, Poison, Weaken)
clan_boss.notes: Decrease DEF 60% is CRITICAL for Clan Boss. Without it, team damage is 30% of potential (70% damage reduction from boss 2800 DEF). With it, team damage increases 1.73×. This is the MOST IMPORTANT debuff for damage.

dungeons.wave_clear_impact: Massive speed increase for wave clear (all champions deal 1.73× damage)
dungeons.boss_impact: Same as Clan Boss (1.73× damage increase)
dungeons.notes: Decrease DEF 60% is CRITICAL for dungeons. Speeds up wave clear AND boss kills. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for all dungeon teams.

arena.speed_impact: Arena is speed-based (first team to nuke wins). Decrease DEF 60% enables team to nuke through high-DEF targets (e.g., Duchess Lilitu, Warlord).
arena.notes: Decrease DEF 60% is HIGH VALUE for Arena. Allows team to one-shot high-DEF targets. Many Arena teams use Decrease DEF champions (Stag Knight, Lyssandra, etc.) as part of nuke chain.

faction_wars.wave_clear_impact: Speeds up wave clear (all champions deal 1.73× damage)
faction_wars.boss_impact: Critical for boss kills (bosses have high DEF)
faction_wars.notes: Decrease DEF 60% is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED for Faction Wars. Many factions struggle with damage output (low ATK champions, no nukers). Decrease DEF 60% compensates by boosting entire team damage.

weaken_25.description: Weaken 25% increases ALL damage by 1.25×. Stacks MULTIPLICATIVELY with Decrease DEF 60% (1.73 × 1.25 = 2.16× total damage increase).
weaken_25.notes: Weaken + Decrease DEF is PREMIUM debuff combo. Total damage increase 2.16× (more than double). If team has both, prioritize BOTH debuffs (massive damage increase).

increase_atk_50.description: Increase ATK 50% boosts team ATK by 1.5×. Stacks MULTIPLICATIVELY with Decrease DEF 60% (1.73 × 1.5 = 2.6× total damage increase).
increase_atk_50.notes: Increase ATK + Decrease DEF is PREMIUM buff/debuff combo. Total damage increase 2.6× (2.6× more damage than no buffs/debuffs). Common in speed-tune teams (buff champion + debuff champion + DPS champions).

hp_burn.description: HP Burn damage is MAX HP percentage (NOT affected by DEF). Decrease DEF does NOT boost HP Burn damage. However, HP Burn + Decrease DEF is still PREMIUM combo (Decrease DEF boosts team damage, HP Burn is separate damage source).
hp_burn.notes: HP Burn is INDEPENDENT damage source (not boosted by Decrease DEF). However, Decrease DEF + HP Burn is still BEST combo for Clan Boss (team damage 1.73× + 15M/turn HP Burn). Use both.

mistake_1_low_acc.mistake: Building Decrease DEF champion with low ACC (e.g., 200 ACC)
mistake_1_low_acc.impact: 200 ACC vs 300 RES = 25% land rate. Stag Knight A2 uptime drops from 26.1% (350 ACC) to 6.5% (200 ACC). Team damage drops from 76M (100% uptime) to 47M (6.5% uptime). MASSIVE damage loss.
mistake_1_low_acc.solution: Build Decrease DEF champions with 350-390 ACC for reliable landing. ACC is CRITICAL stat (even more important than SPD for debuff champions).

mistake_2_using_low_tier_decrease_def.mistake: Using Decrease DEF 15% or 30% instead of Decrease DEF 60%
mistake_2_using_low_tier_decrease_def.impact: Decrease DEF 15% = 1.15× damage increase (vs 1.73× for 60%). Team damage drops from 76M (60%) to 51M (15%). SIGNIFICANT damage loss.
mistake_2_using_low_tier_decrease_def.solution: ALWAYS prioritize Decrease DEF 60% champions (Stag Knight, Rhazin, Warmaiden). Do NOT use Decrease DEF 15% or 30% champions in end-game content (massive damage loss).

mistake_3_not_taking_master_hexer.mistake: Not taking Master Hexer T6 on Decrease DEF champion (Stag Knight, Warmaiden)
mistake_3_not_taking_master_hexer.impact: Stag Knight A2 uptime drops from 34% (with Master Hexer) to 26.1% (without). Team damage drops from 60M (34% uptime) to 55M (26% uptime). MODERATE damage loss.
mistake_3_not_taking_master_hexer.solution: ALWAYS take Master Hexer T6 on Decrease DEF champions with 4-turn CD (Stag Knight, Warmaiden). +30% uptime = +8-10M team damage over 50 turns.

mistake_4_overlapping_decrease_def_sourc.mistake: Using 2+ Decrease DEF 60% champions (e.g., Stag Knight + Rhazin) when Rhazin already has 100% uptime
mistake_4_overlapping_decrease_def_sourc.impact: Rhazin A1 already provides 100% uptime. Adding Stag Knight A2 does NOT increase Decrease DEF uptime (already maxed). Stag Knight A2 is WASTED (could use different debuff champion for Decrease ATK, Weaken, etc.).
mistake_4_overlapping_decrease_def_sourc.solution: If using Rhazin (100% uptime), do NOT add second Decrease DEF 60% champion. Use Stag Knight ONLY if also need Decrease ATK 50% (Stag Knight A2 applies both debuffs). Otherwise, use different debuff champion (Weaken, HP Burn, etc.).

metadata.validation: Cross-referenced with in-game testing (Stag Knight damage increase validation), community calculators, DEF reduction formula
metadata.notes: Comprehensive Decrease DEF mechanics for team building and optimization. CRITICAL FINDING: Decrease DEF 60% is HIGHEST PRIORITY debuff (1.73× team damage increase). Stag Knight A2 contributes +26M team damage over 50 turns (indirect damage via Decrease DEF multiplier).
